subtitle: Everything is changing! Again! It's almost the end of Hot Singularity Summer, and it's time to re-architect the schedule to suit our current student body.
author: Liz
content_html:
Hey Multiverse Crew,

Everything is changing! Again! It's almost the end of Hot Singularity Summer, and it's time to re-architect the schedule to suit our current student body. We're about to redo the main floor of Gather Town, likely this week.

This week we'll be working on Research Projects and recording the episode of Complex Systems Dynamics about agen…
